caption: This photograph depicts an industrial scene, with a focus on a gasoline distribution facility and transport trucks. Several red trucks, branded with the name "PETRO," are prominently featured. In the foreground, a truck is in motion, slightly blurred, indicating it's traveling past the camera. In the midground, there are stationary tankers being filled under a series of canopies, providing some shade for workers who are visible but not distinct. Beyond the trucks, the backdrop includes harbor cranes and industrial buildings, alluding to a waterfront industrial area. A myriad of overhead cables and a traffic light are also visible, crossing above the scene. The overall atmosphere of the image captures busy industrial operations, likely focused on fuel distribution.
title: Allens avenue--waterfront industrial area
